name: Sisyphus (itch) (rusticolus)
description:
Sisyphus cheated death twice through tricking the gods. 

For this, he was condemned into Tartarus to eternally push a boulder up the steep mountains and caverns of the underworld. Whenever he nears reaching the top, the boulder rolls back down to the bottom. This is his punishment.

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Sprint - Left-Shift

Push boulder by moving against it.

Free Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/free-low-p...

https://freepbr.com/materials/lava-rock2-pbr/
